covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 15% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities, each once per day.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 15% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, increasing movement speed by 30%. You may reactivate Soulshape to teleport 10 yds forward.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 10 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Boon of the Ascended
covenants.description:
Draw upon the power of the Ascended for 10 sec, granting you access to <dynamic>Ascended Nova</dynamic>, replacing 

<spec>Shadow</spec>
<dynamic>Mind Flay</dynamic>

<spec>Discipline</spec><spec>Holy</spec>
<dynamic>Smite</dynamic>

 with <dynamic>Ascended Blast</dynamic>, and increasing movement speed by 50%.

Upon expiration, releases an <dynamic>Ascended Eruption</dynamic>:

<dynamic>Explode for (150% of Spell power) Arcane damage to all enemies and (200% of Spell power) healing to all allies within 15 yds, increased by 3% for each stack of Boon of the Ascended.</dynamic>

covenants.name: Ascended Nova
covenants.description:
Release a powerful burst of anima, dealing (42% of Spell power) Arcane damage to all enemies and (40% of Spell power) healing to all allies within 8 yds.

Grants 1 stacks of Boon of the Ascended for each target damaged.

covenants.name: Ascended Blast
covenants.description:
Blasts the enemy with pure Anima, causing (250% of Spell power) Arcane damage and healing a nearby ally for 100% of the damage done.

Grants 5 stack of Boon of the Ascended.

$?c3[<dynamic>Generates 12 Insanity.</dynamic>]
][]

covenants.name: Ascended Eruption
covenants.description: Explode for (150% of Spell power) Arcane damage to all enemies and (200% of Spell power) healing to all allies within 15 yds, increased by 3% for each stack of Boon of the Ascended.

covenants.name: Fae Blessings
covenants.description:
Surround yourself with helpful sprites, causing your next 10 spell casts to aid your target depending on your chosen spell.

<spec>Discipline</spec>


<spec>Holy</spec>


<spec>Shadow</spec>

covenants.name: Unholy Nova
covenants.description:
An explosion of dark energy heals allies within 15 yds for (150% of Spell power) and infects enemies with Unholy Transfusion.

 <dynamic>Unholy Tranfusion</dynamic>
<dynamic>Deals (200% of Spell power) Shadow damage over 15 sec. Allies who damage this target are healed for (12% of Spell power).</dynamic>

covenants.name: Mindgames
covenants.description:
Assault an enemy's mind, dealing (200% of Spell power) Shadow damage and briefly reversing their perception of reality.

$?c3[For 5 sec, the next [(Spell power * 400 / 100) * (1 + Versatility)] damage they deal will heal their target, and the next [(Spell power * 400 / 100) * (1 + Versatility)] healing they deal will damage their target.

<dynamic>Reversed damage and healing generate up to 40 Insanity.</dynamic>]
][For 5 sec, the next [(Spell power * 400 / 100) * (1 + Versatility)] damage they deal will heal their target, and the next [(Spell power * 400 / 100) * (1 + Versatility)] healing they deal will damage their target.

<dynamic>Reversed damage and healing restore up to 4% mana.</dynamic>]

conduits.name: Translucent Image
conduits.description: For the first 2 sec of Fade, you take <dynamic>5</dynamic>% less damage.

conduits.name: Move with Grace
conduits.description: Levitate grants <dynamic>20</dynamic>% increased movement speed.

conduits.name: Clear Mind
conduits.description: Dispel Magic, Purify, and Mass Dispel cost <dynamic>20</dynamic>% less mana.

conduits.name: Charitable Soul
conduits.description: Casting Power Word: Shield on an ally also shields you for <dynamic>10</dynamic>% of the amount for 10 sec.

conduits.name: Light's Inspiration
conduits.description: Desperate Prayer heals you for an additional <dynamic>10</dynamic>% of your maximum health over 5 sec.

conduits.name: Power Unto Others
conduits.description: Casting Power Infusion on an ally reduces its cooldown by <dynamic>5</dynamic> sec.

conduits.name: Shining Radiance
conduits.description: Power Word: Radiance healing is increased by <dynamic>10</dynamic>%.

conduits.name: Pain Transformation
conduits.description: Pain Suppression also heals your target for <dynamic>10</dynamic>% of their maximum health.

conduits.name: Exaltation
conduits.description: Rapture's duration is increased by 2 sec, and its Power Word: Shield enhancement is increased by <dynamic>10</dynamic> %.

conduits.name: Lasting Spirit
conduits.description: Guardian Spirit's duration is increased 5 sec, and it increases healing received by an additional <dynamic>10</dynamic>%.

conduits.name: Swift Penitence
conduits.description: The damage or healing of your first bolt of Penance is increased by <dynamic>15</dynamic> %.

conduits.name: Focused Mending
conduits.description: Prayer of Mending's first target is healed by an additional <dynamic>15</dynamic> %.

conduits.name: Resonant Words
conduits.description: Casting a Holy Word spell increases the healing of your next Heal or Flash Heal by <dynamic>10</dynamic>%.

conduits.name: Mental Recovery
conduits.description: After Psychic Scream ends, affected targets' movement speed is reduced by <dynamic>40</dynamic>% for 5 sec.

conduits.name: Courageous Ascension
conduits.description: Ascended Blast deals an additional <dynamic>20</dynamic>% damage, and Ascended Eruption deals an additional 1% damage per stack of Boon of the Ascended.

conduits.name: Festering Transfusion
conduits.description: Unholy Transfusion's duration is increased by 5 sec and deals <dynamic>10</dynamic>% more damage and healing.

conduits.name: Blessing of Plenty
conduits.description: Fae Blessings affects 2 additional spells, and enhanced casts of Power Word: Shield, Shadow Mend, or Void Bolt have a <dynamic>15</dynamic>% chance to reduce Fae Blessings's cooldown by 5 sec.

conduits.name: Shattered Perceptions
conduits.description: Mindgames lasts an additional 15 sec and deals an additional <dynamic>15</dynamic>% damage or healing.

conduits.name: Shimmering Apparitions
conduits.description: When your Shadow Word: Pain deals non-critical damage, you have a  <dynamic>5</dynamic>% chance to create a Shadowy Apparition.

conduits.name: Mind Devourer
conduits.description: Mind Blast deals an additional <dynamic>5</dynamic>% damage and has a 10% chance to make your next Devouring Plague cost no insanity.

conduits.name: Rabid Shadows
conduits.description: Shadowfiend attack speed is increased by 20%, and it deals <dynamic>10</dynamic>% more damage.

conduits.name: Dissonant Echoes
conduits.description: Void Bolt has a <dynamic>5</dynamic>% chance to reset the cooldown on Void Bolt.

conduits.name: Holy Oration
conduits.description: Spells that reduce the cooldowns of your Holy Words reduce them by  <dynamic>5</dynamic>% more.

legendaries.name: The Penitent One
legendaries.description: Power Word: Radiance has a 50% chance to cause your next Penance to be free and fire 3 extra bolts.

legendaries.name: Clarity of Mind
legendaries.description: During Rapture, Power Word: Shield costs 20% less mana and applies 6 second longer Atonements.

legendaries.name: Kiss of Death
legendaries.description: Reduces Shadow Word: Death's cooldown by 8 sec and causes its damage to trigger Atonement.

legendaries.name: Shadowflame Prism
legendaries.description: Your Shadowfiend or Mindbender deals 20% additional damage as Shadowflame damage, and the cooldown on Shadowfiend and Mindbender is reduced by 40%.

legendaries.name: Painbreaker Psalm
legendaries.description: Shadow Word: Death consumes 6 sec of Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch, instantly dealing that damage to the target and generating 10 Insanity.

legendaries.name: Eternal Call to the Void
legendaries.description: Mind Flay has a chance to spawn a Void Tendril that channels Mind Flay at your target for 15 sec, generating 3 insanity when it deals damage.

legendaries.name: Flash Concentration
legendaries.description: Each time you cast Flash Heal, your next Heal cast within 15 sec has its casting time reduced by 0.5 sec and healing increased by 15%, stacking up to 3 times.

legendaries.name: Harmonious Apparatus
legendaries.description: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

legendaries.name: Cauterizing Shadows
legendaries.description: When Shadow Word: Pain expires on a target, 5 allies within 30 yds of the target are healed for 3% of their maximum health.

legendaries.name: Divine Image
legendaries.description: When you use a Holy Word spell, you have a chance to summon an image of a Naaru at your side. For 15 sec, whenever you cast a spell, the Naaru will cast a similar spell.

legendaries.name: Vault of Heavens
legendaries.description: Leap of Faith instead causes you to leap to your target, and has 2 charges.

legendaries.name: Crystalline Reflection
legendaries.description: Power Word: Shield instantly heals the target for (30% of Spell power) and reflects 30% of damage absorbed.

legendaries.name: Twins of the Sun Priestess
legendaries.description: Power Infusion also grants you 100% of its effects when used on an ally.

legendaries.name: X'anshi, Return of Archbishop Benedictus
legendaries.description: After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to 100% health, based on your effectiveness during Spirit of Redemption. After reviving, you cannot benefit from Spirit of Redemption for 10 min.
